# "Computational Text Analysis" (PGSP11584) {.unnumbered}

This is the dedicated webpage for the course Computational Text Analysis" [(PGSP11584)](http://www.drps.ed.ac.uk/21-22/dpt/cxpgsp11584.htm) at the University of Edinburgh, taught by Christopher Barrie. Go to the Course Overview and Introduction tabs for a course overview and introduction to R.
